statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:EC2Instance)-[:RESOURCE]->(n:SSMInstanceInformation) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:EC2Instance)-[:RESOURCE]->(n:SSMInstancePatch) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n)
